title: InvestSmart AI fintech website with risk-profiling chatbot, recommendations, and supporting pages

requirements.text: Create a mobile-friendly homepage for “InvestSmart AI” with a clean fintech landing layout that explains risk profiling and includes a primary CTA button labeled “Get My Investment Plan”. The homepage must include clear sections covering: Why invest, Power of compounding, Risk vs return, and Diversification.

quotes:
Homepage
- Clean fintech-style landing page
- Explain what risk profiling is
- CTA button: “Get My Investment Plan”
- Section on:
  - Why invest
  - Power of compounding
  - Risk vs return
  - Diversification

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders without errors on mobile and desktop widths.
CTA button text is exactly “Get My Investment Plan”.
Homepage includes distinct content blocks for: risk profiling explanation, why invest, compounding, risk vs return, diversification.

requirements.text: Implement the InvestSmart AI chatbot UI that guides the user through the required risk profiling flow in a conversational, step-by-step format, collecting: age, monthly income, investment goal, investment horizon, risk tolerance choice, and investment knowledge level.

quotes:
Chatbot Functionality (Core)

Step 1 – Risk Profiling Questions:
Ask the user:
- Age  
- Monthly income  
- Investment goal (wealth creation, retirement, education, travel, emergency fund)  
- Investment horizon (1–3 yrs, 3–5 yrs, 5–10 yrs, 10+ yrs)  
- Risk tolerance:
   - I panic if market falls 10%
   - I can tolerate 10–20% fall
   - I can tolerate 30%+ fall  
- Investment knowledge (beginner/intermediate/advanced)

acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot asks for all listed fields and does not allow generating a plan until all answers are provided.
Investment goal choices include: wealth creation, retirement, education, travel, emergency fund.
Investment horizon choices include: 1–3 yrs, 3–5 yrs, 5–10 yrs, 10+ yrs.
Risk tolerance choices match the three sentences provided.
Investment knowledge choices include: beginner, intermediate, advanced.

requirements.text: Add backend logic (single Motoko actor) to classify a completed user profile into exactly one of: Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive, and return the classification to the frontend.

quotes:
Step 2 – Classify User as:
- Conservative  
- Moderate  
- Aggressive

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a canister method that accepts the collected risk-profiling inputs and returns one of: Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive.
The method is deterministic and returns a result for every valid input combination.
Frontend uses the backend response rather than hardcoding the classification entirely in the UI.

requirements.text: Add backend logic (single Motoko actor) to generate investment recommendations based on the user’s classification using the exact asset allocation rules provided for Conservative, Moderate, and Aggressive profiles, and return a structured response to the frontend.

quotes:
Step 3 – Give Investment Recommendation:

For Conservative:
- 60% Debt  
- 30% Index Funds  
- 10% Gold  
Examples: FD, Debt Mutual Funds, Large Cap ETFs

For Moderate:
- 50% Equity  
- 30% Debt  
- 10% Gold  
- 10% Hybrid Funds

For Aggressive:
- 80% Equity  
- 10% Gold  
- 10% Debt  
Include: Index funds, Small cap, Mid cap

acceptanceCriteria: For Conservative, the returned allocation contains exactly: 60% Debt, 30% Index Funds, 10% Gold, and includes examples FD, Debt Mutual Funds, Large Cap ETFs.
For Moderate, the returned allocation contains exactly: 50% Equity, 30% Debt, 10% Gold, 10% Hybrid Funds.
For Aggressive, the returned allocation contains exactly: 80% Equity, 10% Gold, 10% Debt, and includes equity guidance: Index funds, Small cap, Mid cap.
Backend response format is stable/typed and includes allocation labels and percentages suitable for charting.

requirements.text: Implement the chatbot final output screen that shows: Risk Profile Result, an Asset Allocation Pie Chart (if possible), a Monthly SIP suggestion, 3 model portfolios, and a Do’s and Don’ts list, using the backend recommendation response.

quotes:
Step 4 – Output:

The chatbot should generate:

- Risk Profile Result  
- Asset Allocation Pie Chart (if possible)  
- Monthly SIP suggestion  
- 3 model portfolios  
- Do’s and Don’ts

acceptanceCriteria: Results view displays the profile label (Conservative/Moderate/Aggressive).
A pie chart is rendered from the allocation percentages; if a chart cannot be rendered, a clear fallback visualization (e.g., labeled percentage list) is shown.
Monthly SIP suggestion is displayed as a currency-formatted monthly amount derived from the provided user inputs (at minimum monthly income and/or goal/horizon) and described in simple English.
Exactly 3 model portfolios are displayed, each with clear components aligned to the user’s risk profile allocation.
A Do’s and Don’ts section is shown with at least 3 items each, written in simple English.

requirements.text: Create a “Learn Investing” page that presents blog-style educational content for beginner investors in a simple, GenZ-friendly tone (no complex jargon).
acceptanceCriteria: A Learn Investing page exists and is reachable via site navigation.
The page displays multiple blog entries or sections with readable headings and short paragraphs.
Content tone is simple English and beginner-friendly.

requirements.text: Create a SIP Calculator page that lets users input values and calculates a SIP projection, with mobile-friendly form layout and clear results presentation.
acceptanceCriteria: SIP Calculator page exists and is reachable via navigation.
Users can enter SIP inputs (at minimum: monthly investment, expected rate/return, and duration) and see computed results.
Validation prevents empty/invalid inputs from producing NaN/blank results.

requirements.text: Create an “About Us” page for InvestSmart AI.
acceptanceCriteria: About page exists and is reachable via navigation.
About page includes a short description of InvestSmart AI’s purpose for beginner investors.

requirements.text: Create a “Disclaimer” page that clearly states the content is educational only and explicitly “Not SEBI advice”.
acceptanceCriteria: Disclaimer page exists and is reachable via navigation (and/or footer).
Disclaimer text includes both concepts: educational only and “Not SEBI advice”.

requirements.text: Apply the requested UI style and tone across all pages: fintech colors (blue/white/green), minimal Groww/Upstox-like design, mobile-friendly layout, simple English, GenZ-friendly copy, and avoid complex jargon.

quotes:
Tone:
- Simple English  
- GenZ friendly  
- No complex jargon  

UI Style:
- Fintech colors: Blue, White, Green  
- Minimal design like Groww/Upstox  
- Mobile friendly

acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI palette uses blue/white/green consistently across header, buttons, and accents.
Typography and spacing read as minimal/fintech (no cluttered layouts).
All primary flows (homepage CTA, chatbot, calculator) are usable on small screens without horizontal scrolling.
User-facing copy avoids complex finance jargon and uses short, clear sentences.

requirements.text: Add required generated brand assets to the app as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (header/hero) without routing image delivery through the backend.

quotes: Create a professional website with an AI chatbot named “InvestSmart AI”.

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
UI renders the logo in the site header and uses the hero illustration on the homepage.
No backend endpoints are used to serve images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify immutable hook/entry files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not integrate external LLM APIs (e.g., OpenAI/Anthropic) for chatbot responses.
Do not implement third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
Do not provide real financial advisory or SEBI registration workflows; keep recommendations educational and rule-based.

required: Fintech wordmark logo reading “InvestSmart AI”, clean minimal vector style, blue/green on white (investsmart-logo.dim_512x128.png)
Modern fintech hero illustration with abstract growth chart + coins + shield motif, minimal flat style, blue/green palette on white (investsmart-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 3 minimal line icons: shield, pie chart, and rocket; consistent stroke style; blue/green (investsmart-icons.dim_512x512.png)
